## Technical Deep Dive {.center}

### Why This Happens

```javascript
// Browser security check (simplified)
if (externalDomain && !sameOrigin) {
  if (xFrameOptions === 'DENY') {
    blockIframe();
  }
  if (cspFrameAncestors === 'none') {
    blockIframe();
  }
}
```

### **Poll Everywhere's Likely Setup:**
- **X-Frame-Options: DENY** - Prevents all embedding
- **CSP: frame-ancestors 'none'** - Modern security standard
- **Domain restrictions** - Only allows embedding on specific sites

### **The Reality:**
Even services that claim to support embedding often have restrictions that make it unreliable for classroom use.
